alert.note: Alert for Albany; Rensselaer; Saratoga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 4:56PM EST until December 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River at Troy. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Water reaches streets in Waterford Village and Matsons Shipyard on Van Schaick Island. Some basements flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 18.5 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Troy Flood Stage: 21.5 Observed Stage at Tue 4 pm: 23.2 Forecast: Tue 7 pm 22.6 Wed 1 am 21.8 Wed 7 am 21.2 Wed 1 pm 20.6 Wed 7 pm 20.2 Thu 1 am 19.8 Thu 7 am 19.5 Thu 1 pm 19.3 Thu 7 pm 19.1 Fri 1 am 18.8 Fri 7 am 18.6 Fri 1 pm 18.5 &&
